name: Mr Dirt Poor
detailed_description:
Game background:

《Mr Dirt Poor》is a simulation game.In this game,players are part-time workers without wealth and status.So you have to start with some simple part-time job,improve ourselves and learn new knowledge. You may choose your own favorite career afterwards.It is your effort to decide whether you would succeed in the end

Game features:


⦁Game Development system: If capable, you may develop your own game to make some money. It is not only the quality of the game matters, but also you have to seize the chance of marketing.

⦁Random plot: Random events make you excited or upset everyday, bringing you entirely different game experience.

⦁Built-in Games: Each job has a mini game built in. What you will be doing are completely different among the works. And of course, the plots during the work are also different each day.

⦁24/7 mode: In the unique 24/7 mode,you will stay up all night to work or play.

⦁Reappearance of the scenes: You will discover something special about this game!

⦁L interaction system: A system for players to have fun with NPCs.

⦁L system: This is a mysterious system!

Part-time system:


⦁Handing leaflets: In this job,players will hand out leaflets by the street. But as long as you can have some paycheck, what does it matter?

⦁Promoters: In this job, players act as promoters. You are responsible for Pleasing customers,invoicing, packing stuffs, and so on.But what if you encounter customers with troubles?

⦁Restaurant cashier: In this job,players act as front desk cashiers. You will chat with customers, billing, packing things and so much more.

Career system:


A spotlight of this game is that players can choose every single career to master, but will it be successful finally?

Art style:


The game uses the cartoon style for players to experience different feeling!

Easter egg:


The game has an unique L system hidden and highly related to the game. The system can help you acomplish almost all the tasks or jobs.

short_description: 《Mr Dirt Poor》tells the story of the daily hard work of an independent developer.He paid the time and sweat,and also tried all kinds of methods to make money, but was always end up with failing. In the desperate time, there comes new hopes, but what are they? What are waiting for him ahead.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
